message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000.  What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $9,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $12,500. This product is truly top-of-the-line and I believe it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate the discount, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,500?
